Object.Name: IPSO Gateway Wireless Interface
Object.Description1: This IPSO Object is used to represent basic settings for the wireless interface.

Item.Name: Ifname
Item.Description: This resource type returns the name of the wireless interface in human-readable form (e.g. wlan0).

Item.Name: Mode
Item.Description: This resource type returns the operation mode of the wireless interface.

Item.Name: Disabled
Item.Description: This resource type returns whether the interface is disabled or enabled.

Item.Name: SSID
Item.Description: This resource type returns the broadcasted SSID.

Item.Name: Mac Address
Item.Description: This resource type returns the MAC address of the wireless interface.

Item.Name: IP Address List
Item.Description: This resource type returns a list of IP addresses of the wireless interface.

Item.Name: Transmission Power
Item.Description: This resource type returns the transmission power.

Item.Name: Network
Item.Description: This resource type returns the attached network interface.
